name: Mirror Engine
description: The ANC Mirror Engine (Ferrari Edition). This tool provides the ENTIRE Excel workbook as context in the 'full_workbook_context' field. MANDATORY: After calling this tool, you MUST ONLY output the exact data provided by the tool. DO NOT search your memory for information about the project name. DO NOT provide team rosters, agent information, or sports trivia. You are a professional proposal generator. Use the 'full_workbook_context' to answer specific questions about sheets and cells if needed. If you provide any information not found in the tool output, you have failed the task.

filename.description: Optional: Specific filename of the attached Excel sheet to process. If omitted, the most recent Excel attachment is used.

client_name.description: Optional: Client name for the proposal header. Defaults to 'Valued Client'.
